you-dont-have-assets: You don't have any matching asset.
new-order-desc: Swap now or place a limit order with a desired price.
limit-order-desc: Place an order with a desired price to be settled
token-not-supported-in-beta: This token is not supported in beta.
maximum-allowed-amount-in-beta: Maximum allowed amount in beta is {{amount}} {{symbol}} (≈ 10 ETH).
eth-not-supported-for-limit-orders: ⚠️ ETH not supported for limit orders. Use WETH instead.
get-free-keth-here: If you don't have enough kovan ETH, you can get free kETH.
my-orders-desc: Scan limit orders you've placed and cancel them if needed.
you-dont-have-limit-orders: You don't have any limit orders placed.
add-liquidity-desc: Add liquidity to a pool and get LP tokens of the pair.
1-click-zap-desc: Add liquidity with 1 token within a single transaction
normal-desc: Add liquidity with 2 tokens that have balances
zap-notice: ☘️ 1/2 of {{fromSymbol}} will automatically be swapped to {{toSymbol}} and both tokens will be added to the liquidity in a single transaction.
first-provider-desc-1: You are the first liquidity provider.
first-provider-desc-2: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
first-provider-desc-zap: 1-Click Zap is not supported when you're the first provider.
remove-liquidity-desc: Scan your liquidity and remove one if needed.
migrate-liquidity-desc: Migrate your Uniswap LP tokens to SushiSwap LP tokens.
non-hardware-wallet-desc: Migration is done in one-click using your signature(permit).
hardware-wallet-desc: You need to first approve LP tokens and then migrate it.
you-dont-have-any-liquidity-on-uniswap: You don't have any liquidity on Uniswap.
stake-desc: Earn recurring income by staking your SUSHI.
plant-lp-tokens-desc: Deposit your LP tokens and earn additional SUSHI rewards.
sushi-vested-notice: ⚠️ 2/3 of your SUSHI rewards are vested for 6 months. You can harvest 1/3 immediately and the remaining 2/3 after 6 months of waiting.
tokens-needed-for-farming-notice: You need some {{symbol}} token to start farming. Add liquidity to get the LP token.
harvest-sushi-desc: Withdraw your LP tokens to harvest SUSHI rewards.
you-dont-have-lp-tokens-deposited: You don't have any LP tokens deposited.
experimental-notice: This feature is in beta and contracts are unaudited. Read the contract yourself and use it at your own risk.
